label: Video quality
info: This option reduce quality of videos (ex Youtube : Very low=144p, Low=240p, Medium=360p). Lower quality means less data and calculation

label: Video click to load/play embed
info: This option 'transform' iframe video embeds into 'low' preview of these videos. You have to click on it to load and play the iframe and the video. It avoid loading tons of script and files, if you're not watching the video.

label: Video custom attributes
info: This option adds attributes to video elements : loop='false', autoplay='false' (possibly preload='none')

label: Image srcset
info: Images may contain high-definition resolutions. This option remove biggest images (works only for lazy-loaded images).

label: Send save-data header
info: Add header 'Save-data:on'. Some websites may reduce the weight of a page if save-data is enabled.

label: custom gif player
info: With this option, you have to hover the gif for playing it, it avoid permanent rendering of the screen. For services like giphy, it only load optimized images when hovering.

label: block image avatar
info: This option blocks avatar images like Gravatar, Twitter, Reddit...

label: Block social widgets
info: Block social widgets, like Share Button, Like Button etc...

label: Disable css animation
info: Disable css transition and animation. Animations force browser to render and may cause reflow.

label: Disable marquee animation
info: Disable old marquee animations. Animations may cause render and reflow
